overview: Woohyun, who has a fluttering thumb with Yeongju. He fell in love with the lord who remembered the words he said as if it were flowing. One day, Yeongju came to Woohyun with food as a surprise. Woo-hyeon falls in love with Young-joo's consideration and invites Young-ju to his house... However, somehow, Yeong-joo has lost contact since then and Na-hee approaches Woo-hyun who is desperate.
title: Her sweet taste
